RecievingOptionsController - Class in othercontrollers
This Class is a Receiving Options Page Controller for RecievingOprions.fxml ,it runs all the methods that functions the choice of receiving the order by the customer the choices are pickup (physical pickup) Delivery Note: this class uses help from Customer and Order class to set and get some functionalities

ReviewCustomersRegistrationsController - Class in registrationcontrollers
This class is a Review Registrations Controller for ReviewRegistrationsPage.fxml the function of this class is to display all registrations that are awaiting review the reviewing is done by the area manager associated with the users, the area manager is shown a table (list) with users that are awaiting confirmation each row in this table shows information of user awaiting confirmation, the area manager is given the option to either confirm or reject given user This class also uses other classes to help manage the properties one of the classes is TableRow - which helps us add rows to our table of users registered
ReviewCustomersRegistrationsController() - Constructor for class registrationcontrollers.ReviewCustomersRegistrationsController
 
ReviewCustomersRegistrationsController.TableRow - Class in registrationcontrollers
This class is a TableRow for the table which the users registered and awaiting confrimation will be displayed parameters of the class are FirstName, LastName, Email, PhoneNumber, CreditCard, UserType another variable is a Button, this button will be used to confirm said user all these variables are defining details of our user the class has a constructor that allows us to set the data through it, we also have getters and setters for each variables as well we use this class mainly to add each instance into a row of the table we have
reviewWorkerRegister(ActionEvent) - Method in class homepagescontrollers.AreaManagerInterfaceController
Method for redirecting page - this method will redirect the user to the reviewRegistrations page

run() - Method in class client.LogOutTimer
The run method is used to check the mouse activity every second, if the mouse is inactive for a specific amount of time the user will be logged out.

Waits for messages from the server.
